scannedAreas: selected components/ui reports (AutoComplete, Button, Toaster variants, input/label/popover helpers)
highLevelDuplicationHotspots: Prefix / prefixed-name expansion and prefix->IRI resolution: repeated in rdfManager, termDisplay, ontologyStore, reasoningStore, and multiple UI components. Recommendation: extract a single prefix-expansion utility (expand/contract) and use rdfManager only as the authoritative namespace map.

Node/edge canonicalization & rdf:type selection: similar logic appears in rdfParser, ontologyStore, nodeDisplay, reasoningStore, and ReactFlowCanvas. Recommendation: centralize canonical node-shaping and 'pick meaningful rdf:type' logic into a shared utility.

RDF persistence (add/remove quads): multiple modules write quads directly to the RDF store (ReactFlowCanvas, reasoningStore, rdfManager helpers). Recommendation: add high-level rdfManager methods (addTriple/removeTriple/addInferredQuad) and route all writes through them to ensure consistent graph naming and subject-change notifications.

Namespace/used-namespace detection: store-scanning logic in NamespaceLegend and rdfManager duplicates work. Recommendation: expose an rdfManager helper to compute used namespaces to avoid repeated full-store scans and to allow indexing/debouncing.

Palette & color mapping: palette building logic appears in multiple places (palette helpers, node components, legend). Recommendation: consolidate palette building into a single helper consumed by node rendering and legend components.
nextRecommendedSteps: Review the index.json and per-file reports to prioritize refactors.
Implement a small, high-value refactor first (suggestion: extract prefix-expansion utility and update callers). I can prepare an automated patch if you want.
Optionally continue scanning remaining UI files for full coverage (not strictly necessary before refactors).
